name: thinkitive-video-renderer
summary: Video renderer used by Thinkitive Lab to render a video or image with multiple Lottie animations as overlay
description:
Short VideoRenderer class that renders Lottie AnimationView on top of a AVAsset at specified CGRect coordinates
Each frame of AnimationView is rendered at the corresponding time of the AVasset

Library provides a LottieOverlayView with custom initialiser which must have a superView when video is rendered
A set of LottieOverlayView instances can be provided to AVAsset when rendering
